CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 26, 1954, pg. 11, reads: "HOSTESS - AIDES - The charming group of hostess-aides, who gave the gay rehearsal dinner for the Anne Butler - Sherman Jones wedding party last Friday night at the home of Mrs. Corinne Lindsay, are pictured during the soiree which set a new high in delightful entertaining in Pittsburgh. Seated front: Mmes. Kathleen Douglass, Elizabeth Youngue, who was soloist at the wedding; Edna Williams and Louise Stanton.  Second row: Mmes. Harriet Lewis, Ada Rickmond and Estelle Briggs.  Center Mmes. Alice Brady and Charlotte Catlin, who played the nuptial music Saturday.  Rear: Mmes. Daisy E. Lampkin, Betty Butler, Corrine Lindsay, Helen Phillips, Edwina Harris, Gladys Curtis and Gladys Garrett. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Women gathered around stairs, seated from left front: Kathleen Douglass, Elizabeth Youngue, Edna Williams, Louise Stanton; second row: Harriet Lewis, Ada Rickmond, Estelle Briggs; third: Alice Brady, Charlotte Enty Catlin; fourth: Daisy E. Lampkin, Betty Butler, Corrine Lindsay wearing dress with floral neckline, Helen Phillips, Edwina Harris, Gladys Curtis, and Gladys Garrett, in Lindsay home, another version
